title: Effect of Temperature on Algae Growth

content.description: A massive increase in the growth of a specific species of algae resulted in record-breaking levels of a potentially dangerous toxin being released into the water. A researcher hypothesizes that the unusual growth of this algal species was caused by an increase in water temperature. The researcher designs an experiment to test the hypothesis.
content.question: Which of the following is the dependent variable in the researcherâ€™s experiment?

choices.label: The concentration of toxin in the water
The different species of algae growing in the water

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
